title: #234: Profiling Aaron Hernandez Part 3
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa analyse Aaron Hernandez, discuss domestic violence and violence in sport and break down the Netflix show Killer Inside: The Mind of Aaron Hernandez.

#HisNameWasOdinLloyd

#DomesticViolence


Laura Richards from Real Crime Profile is taking part in Podcast Live: Crime - a podcast festival over two evenings dedicated to murder, investigations and bad behaviour.

The event's at Wilton's Music Hall in Whitechapel.Laura Richards from Real Crime Profile will be on Wednesday 8th April at 9.30pm

Visit

https://www.podcastlive.com/realcrimeprofile/
